```{Rcpp gibbs_sampler}
#include <Rcpp.h>

using namespace Rcpp;

// [[Rcpp::export]]
NumericMatrix gibbs_fast(int N, int thin) {
  
  NumericMatrix mat(N, 2);
  double x = 0;
  double y = 0;
  
  for(int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
    for(int j = 0; j < thin; j++) {
      x = R::rgamma(3.0, 1.0 / (y * y + 4));
      y = R::rnorm(1.0 / (x + 1), 1.0 / sqrt(2 * x + 2));
    }
    
    mat(i, 0) = x;
    mat(i, 1) = y;
  }
  
  return(mat);
}
```

```{r}
as.tibble(gibbs_fast(100, 1000))
```
